content.content:
- `0` - Success 
- `1` - Generic error 
- `2` - Authorization error 
- `3` - Invalid data 
- `4` - Timeout 
- `5` - Unsupported circuit 
- `6` - Missing data 
- `7` - Invalid card: expired card etc 
- `8` - Canceled by the user 
- `9` - Double transaction 
- `10` - Excessive amount 
- `11` - Order not present 
- `12` - Invalid method 
- `13` - Retriable KO 
- `14` - Invalid session
- `15` - Already onboarded
- `25` - Psp error
- `116` - Balance limit
- `117` - CVV error
- `121` - Limit exceeded
content.title: Outcome Codes

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
let threshold = 0.8;
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex "ecommerce/checkout/v1/payment-requests/[^/]+"
| summarize
  Total=count(),
  Success=count(httpStatus_d < 500) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| extend availability=toreal(Success) / Total
| project TimeGenerated, availability, watermark=threshold
| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "availability(%)")

content.Query:
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex "payment-wallet-outcomes/v1/wallets/outcomes" and (requestQuery_s contains "outcome")
| extend outcome = extract(@"outcome=([^&]+)", 1, requestQuery_s)
| summarize req=count() by outcome, Time=bin(TimeGenerated,15m)
| render barchart with (kind=stacked)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
let threshold = 0.8;
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)

content.Query:
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex "payment-wallet-outcomes/v1/wallets/outcomes" and (requestQuery_s contains "outcome")
| extend outcome = extract(@"outcome=([^&]+)", 1, requestQuery_s)
| summarize req=count() by outcome, Time=bin(TimeGenerated,15m)
| render piechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
let threshold = 0.8;
AzureDiagnostics

content.Query:
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
let threshold = 0.8;
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s == "/checkout/payment-wallet/v1/users/wallets" and method_s == "GET"
| summarize
  Total=count(),
  Success=count(httpStatus_d < 500) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| extend availability=toreal(Success) / Total
| project TimeGenerated, availability, watermark=threshold
| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "availability(%)")

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let api_url = "ecommerce/checkout/v1/payment-requests/[^/]+";
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex api_url
| extend HTTPStatus = case(
  httpStatus_d between (100 .. 199), "1XX",
  httpStatus_d between (200 .. 299), "2XX",
  httpStatus_d between (300 .. 399), "3XX",
  httpStatus_d between (400 .. 499), "4XX",
  "5XX")
| summarize count() by HTTPStatus, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render areachart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "count")

content.Query:
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s == "/checkout/payment-wallet/v1/users/wallets" and method_s == "GET"
| extend HTTPStatus = case(
                          httpStatus_d between (100 .. 199),
                          "1XX",
                          httpStatus_d between (200 .. 299),
                          "2XX",
                          httpStatus_d between (300 .. 399),
                          "3XX",
                          httpStatus_d between (400 .. 499),
                          "4XX",
                          "5XX"
                      )
| summarize count() by HTTPStatus, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render areachart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "count")

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
let threshold = 3;
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex "ecommerce/checkout/v1/payment-requests/[^/]+"
| summarize
    watermark=threshold,
    duration_percentile_95=percentiles(timeTaken_d, 95) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "response time(s)")

let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
let threshold = 0.99;

| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex "/payment-wallet-notifications/v1/wallets/[^/]+/sessions/[^/]+/notifications" and httpMethod_s == "POST"
| summarize
  Total=count(),
  Success=countif(httpStatus_d < 500 and timeTaken_d < 0.25) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| extend availability=toreal(Success) / Total
| project TimeGenerated, availability, watermark=threshold
| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "availability(%)")

  httpStatus_d between (100 .. 199), "1XX",
  httpStatus_d between (200 .. 299), "2XX",
  httpStatus_d between (300 .. 399), "3XX",
  httpStatus_d == 400, "400",
  httpStatus_d == 401, "401",
  httpStatus_d between (402 .. 499), "4XX",
  "5XX")
| summarize count() by HTTPStatus, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render areachart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "count")

  httpStatus_d between (100 .. 199), "1XX",
  httpStatus_d between (200 .. 299), "2XX",
  httpStatus_d between (300 .. 399), "3XX",
  httpStatus_d between (400 .. 499), "4XX",
  "5XX")
| summarize count() by HTTPStatus, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render areachart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "count")

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
let threshold = 2;

| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)

| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "response time(s)")

chart.title: Max Normalized RU for pagopa-p-itn-pay-wallet-cosmos-account by Region
Max Provisioned Throughput for pagopa-p-itn-pay-wallet-cosmos-account by Region

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex "payment-wallet-outcomes/v1/wallets/outcomes" and (requestQuery_s contains "outcome")
| extend outcome = extract(@"outcome=([^&]+)", 1, requestQuery_s)
| extend walletId = extract(@"walletId=([^&]+)", 1, originalRequestUriWithArgs_s)
| extend gateway = iff(walletId startswith "00000000-0000-4000-0000", "PM", iff(walletId != "", "NPG", "UNKNOWN"))
| project outcome, gateway, originalRequestUriWithArgs_s

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let api_url = "/io-payment-wallet/v1/wallets/[^/]+";
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex api_url and httpMethod_s == "DELETE"
| project  httpMethod_s, originalRequestUriWithArgs_s, httpStatus_d, clientIP_s, userAgent_s, transactionId_g, TimeGenerated
| extend walletId = extract(@"wallets/([^/]+)", 1, originalRequestUriWithArgs_s)
| extend gateway = iff(walletId startswith "00000000-0000-4000-0000", "PM", "NPG")
| project gateway, httpStatus_d, originalRequestUriWithArgs_s

content.Query:
let api_url = "/io-payment-wallet/v1/wallets/[^/]+";
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex api_url and httpMethod_s == "DELETE"
| project  httpMethod_s, originalRequestUriWithArgs_s, httpStatus_d, clientIP_s, userAgent_s, transactionId_g, TimeGenerated
| extend walletId = extract(@"wallets/([^/]+)", 1, originalRequestUriWithArgs_s)
| extend gateway = iff(walletId startswith "00000000-0000-4000-0000", "PM", "NPG")
| project gateway, httpStatus_d, originalRequestUriWithArgs_s, TimeGenerated
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), gateway

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let api_url = "/io-payment-wallet/v1/wallets/[^/]+";
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex api_url and httpMethod_s == "DELETE"
| project  httpMethod_s, originalRequestUriWithArgs_s, httpStatus_d, clientIP_s, userAgent_s, transactionId_g, TimeGenerated
| extend walletId = extract(@"wallets/([^/]+)", 1, originalRequestUriWithArgs_s)
| extend gateway = iff(walletId startswith "00000000-0000-4000-0000", "PM", "NPG")

content.Query:
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex "payment-wallet-outcomes/v1/wallets/outcomes" and (requestQuery_s contains "outcome")
| extend outcome = extract(@"outcome=([^&]+)", 1, requestQuery_s)
| extend walletId = extract(@"walletId=([^&]+)", 1, originalRequestUriWithArgs_s)
| where walletId !startswith "00000000-0000-4000-0000" and walletId != ""
| project outcome, TimeGenerated
| summarize req=count() by Time=bin(TimeGenerated,15m), outcome

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AzureDiagnostics
 | extend HTTPStatus = case(
                          toint(httpStatusCode_s) between (100 .. 199),
                          "1XX",
                           toint(httpStatusCode_s) between (200 .. 299),
                          "2XX",
                           toint(httpStatusCode_s) between (300 .. 399),
                          "3XX",
                           toint(httpStatusCode_s) between (400 .. 499),
                          "4XX",
                          "5XX"
                      )
| summarize count() by HTTPStatus, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render areachart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "count")

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
StorageQueueLogs
| where (OperationName == "PutMessage" or OperationName == "DeleteMessage") and ObjectKey startswith "/pagopapitnpaywalletsa/pagopa-p-itn-pay-wallet-cdc-queue"
| summarize count() by OperationName, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
